alert.note: Alert for Lajas (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 05 at 4:42PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM AST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following , interior sections of Lajas especially between Barrio Candelaria and Barrio Santa Rosa. * WHEN...Until 630 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. Quick rises along rivers and small streams. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 442 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms continued. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch will be possible over the area. This additional rain and excessive runoff will result in minor flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
